attributes.action: Change the logo for the 2012 London Olypics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a poll of nearly 2,000 visitors to the BBC website within hours of it's unveiling, only 3.4% of those answering the poll did so favourably, with nearly 84% expressing a strong dislike of the logo for the 2012 London Olympics.  We therefore ask, in the face of strong public dislike of the logo, that the Prime Minister request that the 2012 committee change the logo ASAP before we are embarrassed as a nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
